channel.title: Change What interface shows
channel.description: Ok wehn i type ::rules on my server it shows like the scroll paper with the rules on it, thats all fine but when i type ::commands i want it to show a book that displays my commands, and if possible be able to turn the page and it shows more commands, ive searched all over the forums and cant find out how, im on a delta server, i know please dont flame me, im a delta fan sorry.

item.title: Change What interface shows
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

Ok wehn i type ::rules on my server it shows like the scroll paper with the rules on it, thats all fine but when i type ::commands i want it to show a book that displays my commands, and if possible be able to turn the page and it shows more commands, ive searched all over the forums and cant find out how, im on a delta server, i know please dont flame me, im a delta fan sorry.
